title: Have a New Husband by Friday: How to Change His Attitude, Behavior & Communication in 5 Days
description: David Nasser is the visionary behind David Nasser Outreach. Every year he speaks to more than 700,000 people at revivals, citywide rallies, festivals, conferences, special events, camps, and concerts. The author of Glory Revealed and A Call to Die, Nasser lives with his wife, Jennifer, and their two children in Alabama.
author: Kevin Leman
